short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin for jira, it enables copy paste buttons and fixes OTD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Custome plugins for Jira created for testing purpose
OTD Jira extension which will automatically remove parameters, it also contains copy paste buttons.
